short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alerts other TagPro players that you are playing and sends you an alert when others begin to play.

To play TagPro, get the Chrome app:
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/tagpro-capture-the-flag/bommelfnddjcbmbcfhmhjikpfphlebjh

Or visit this website:
